edu.arizona.biosemantics.semanticmarkup.ling.normalize.lib

Class Normalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.arizona.biosemantics.semanticmarkup.ling.normalize.lib.Normalizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    INormalizer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FNAv19Normalizer, TreatisehNormalizer

    public abstract class Normalizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements INormalizer
    Normalizer implements a strategy to normalize text according to the previous version of charaparser

        private java.lang.String to_Range(java.lang.String text)
        deal with: to-range such as "to 3 cm", "to 24 Ã— 5 mm", "to 2 . 7 Ã— 1 . 7 â€“ 2 mm", "3 â€“ 20 ( â€“ 25 )" text = text.replaceAll(" (up )?to (?=[\\d\\. ]{1,6} )", " 0 - "); // <trees> to 3 cm to <trees> 0 - 3 cm: works for case 1, 3, (case 4 should not match) "verb-ed to" pattern is excluded

        Returns:

        Parameters:
        chunkedTokens -
        inlist: - & & & & & & & & & & & & & & & coloration @ & & & & & & & &
        Returns:
